metadata.Title: CVE-2015-0846 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
django-markupfield before 1.3.2 uses the default docutilsRESTRUCTUREDTEXT_FILTER_SETTINGS settings, which allows remote attackers toinclude and read arbitrary files via unspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-0846` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-django-markupfield - 1.3.4-1
python3-django-markupfield - 1.3.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: django-markupfield package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.4-1').
